item.title: Hugo Site Generator
item.description: What is Hugo? The claim is that Hugo is: The worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites SImply put, it’s an open-source static site generator. What I love about this There is no monkey business with plugins, add-ons, themes, updates, security and more. Simply start writing in your favorite text editor, save and live-reload at play. A couple of items are at play here: no host, using GitHub pages to serve out this website.
